ThingDef.label: 3HST LGIS missile Launcher
ThingDef.description: Small caliber infantry-portable missile launcher employed by 3HST grenadiers. Built-in low-power rail accelerator gives missile greater range.

ThingDef.Name: BaseDisposableLGIS
ThingDef.description: A single-use LGIS launcher designed to give cannon fodders some basic heavy fire capability. Instead of the rail accelerator found on normal LGIS launchers, this one uses chemical propellant to boost the missile's range.

RecipeDef.label: make disposable frag LGIS launcher x5
make disposable HEAT LGIS launcher x5
make disposable thermobaric LGIS launcher x5
make disposable confetti LGIS launcher x5
make disposable incendiary LGIS launcher x5
make disposable smoke LGIS launcher x5
make disposable firefoam LGIS launcher x5
make disposable EMP LGIS launcher x5

ThingDef.label: Disposable indirect frag LGIS launcher
ThingDef.description: A single-use LGIS launcher designed to give cannon fodders some basic heavy fire capability. Instead of the rail accelerator found on normal LGIS launchers, this one uses chemical propellant to boost the missile's range. This one comes with a indirect fire sight

ThingDef.label: Multiple LGIS VLS
ThingDef.description: A multiple LGIS missile turret with it's targeting system set to indirect fire.

ThingDef.label: multiple LGIS missile launcher
ThingDef.description: A multiple rocket launcher capable of holding and firing 25 LGIS missiles. Built-in low-power rail accelerator gives missile greater range.

ThingDef.label: dual high-angle LGIS turret
ThingDef.description: A dual LGIS missile turret with it's targeting system set to indirect fire.

ThingDef.label: dual LGIS missile launcher
ThingDef.description: A multiple rocket launcher capable of holding and firing 2 LGIS missiles. Built-in low-power rail accelerator gives missile greater range.

ThingDef.label: Multiple LGIS Launcher
ThingDef.description: A multiple LGIS missile turret with it's targeting system set to direct fire.

ThingDef.label: multiple LGIS missile launcher
ThingDef.description: A multiple rocket launcher capable of holding and firing 27 LGIS missiles. Built-in low-power rail accelerator gives missile greater range.
